title: If you have/had pets, the dumbest thing you can do to them is to give
text:
If you have/had pets, the dumbest thing you can do to them is to give them up for some lame reason.
(Representative Image)
Through no fault of their own, these loving animals who have provided love and companionship to their human families, often for years, are unceremoniously dumped because someone in the family is pregnant or is ill.
(Representative Image)
Instead of living out their years in a warm home, these animals are confined to shelters or even worse just left out in the world. And the odds are they’ll never ever get out.
(Representative Image)
Ricky Gervais once said: “How can anyone abandon a beautifully loyal dog? It’s not an accessory, it’s your f—ing best friend.”
But it’s even harder to not abandon your pet despite all odds.
(Representative Image)
This Facebook post by Shravan Krishnan tells the story of a woman who held on to her pets despite having a difficult pregnancy. And guess what? They helped her get through it.
You can read the post here and renew your reasons to love your pet/s unconditionally, and guess what? They will love you back the same!
